page.title: 11Wood Hall Hotel
page.content: This is the only{hotel and country {club}of notable size in the Waldringfield - Shottisham block. It is situated between{Sutton}and Shottisham}at the end of a private road. It is a beautiful building set in lovely surroundings + is built on the site of a smaller building reputed to have been mentioned in the {first Domesday Book.}Part of the building was built in the 1400s and added to in 1566. The Hotel has{19 bedrooms,}a dining room is open to non-residents and non-members. The{sports facilities}at present, are squash, tennis + swimming, with further planning permission granted. The Hotel and Country Club is used by many{American personnel}from the nearby{USAF bases}as well as people from nearby towns.
